channel.title: Server update
channel.description: umm does any 1 know how i can make like it so it does a count down for a server update? like from 1min to 0 and then it will update?

item.title: Server update
item.dc:creator: @rova1 rova1
item.description:
@rova1 wrote:

			if (command.startsWith("update") && (command.length() > 7)
					&& (playerRights > 2)) {
				PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = (Integer.parseInt(command
						.substring(7)) + 1);
				PlayerHandler.updateAnnounced = false;
				PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true;
				PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis();
			}

that command for delta

you just type like
::update 60
(for 1min, 120 for 2mins, etc, its in seconds)

Read full topic

item.title: Server update
item.dc:creator: @PLayRooney PLayRooney
item.description:
@PLayRooney wrote:

str2own99:

umm does any 1 know how i can make like it so it does a count down for a server update? like from 1min to 0 and then it will update?

Good Question I’ve Seen a few servers that have that. i think its From the “run Conrtol panels” like Where you double click run and the “Admin controle Pannel” appears on some sources. idk…[quote=“Vexillum, post:2, topic:369219”]Or you can just log in and tell everyone you are restarting the server and to logout.[/quote]
Was That Really Necessary?
